title: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2
description:
Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 (Dragon Ball Xeaunts 2) is a representative of the action-adventure genre that will send you into a huge animated universe. This project was developed as a continuation of an incredible adventure about the most powerful and brave hero, whose role you will play. Our hero has a powerful force, with the use of which he can easily erase any planet or even the universe from outer space.
At first, our hero imagined himself too much, and believed that he definitely could not be found equal in strength which he was very wrong about, because he met a lot of new heroes, the curve surpassed him in power. Darkness has come and wants to devour all the planets, and gradually you will fight with the supporters of evil to protect your world. It will not be so easy to defeat opponents, so you will need a sufficient amount of time, to improve your fighting skills and abilities. The game area has a huge scale and a lot of opportunities for the player, so you definitely wonâ€™t be bored. Autobahn Police Simulator 3

system_requirements.Processor: AMD Phenom II X2 550, 3.1GHz | Intel Pentium G4400, 3.30GHz
